#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
int read()
{
    int c = getchar();
    while(c < 33)
        c = getchar();
    int k = 0;
 
    while (c > 32)
    {
        k = k*10 + (int)c-48;
        c = getchar();
    }
 
    return k;
}
 
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    int x;
    x = read();
    while(x--)
    {
        long long int a;
        a = read();
        long long int arr[a];
       for(int x = 0; x < a; x++)
        arr[x] = read();
       if(a%2==0)
        cout << "-1" << endl;
       else
       {
           if(a==1)
            cout << arr[0] << endl;
           else
           {
                sort(arr,arr+a);
                cout << arr[(a/2)] << endl;
           }
 
       }
 
    }
  return 0;
}
